des: "This is a great recipe I created out of leftover cranberry sauce after Thanksgiving and a few slices of plain yellow cake.  It is delicious, surprisingly light, and satisfying! Enjoy! You can sprinkle a little confectioners' sugar on top for an extra touch."
ins: Slice each piece of cake in half to make two thinner slices. Place one of the slices onto a plate. Top with a spoonful of the cranberry sauce and a dollop of whipped cream. Place the remaining slices of cake on top, spread more cranberry sauce and top with more whipped cream.
